name: 6th International Advanced Research in Accounting, Economics, and Management Conference
content: If you are a member of academia, a researcher, a scholar, or a representative of a non-profit or governmental agency in the fields of economics, management, or accounting, then you canâ€™t miss ARMEACONF 2024\. Between the 20-22 September, hundreds of attendees from all around the world will come together in the spectacular city of Prague. The 6th International Conference on Advanced Research in Management, Economics, and Accounting will feature thought-provoking presentations, open discussions, and memorable networking sessions. Diving into such topics as insurance management, e-management, behavioral science in management, and a dozen others, this conference will give you enough drive, knowledge, and inspiration to fuel your next research project. The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour free of charge, so learn about Prague City. All accepted papers will be published with ISBN numbers in soft form. All papers have publication opportunities in various indexed international journals: SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS, and conference proceedings. The ARMEACONF will return as an in-person event in Prague in Sep 2024 & also include the live-stream Virtual component for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn, connect, and network. Delegates can attend & present their papers either in person or online from anywhere in the world. An Invitation Letter will be issued and sent after registration and payment of the registration fee.
